tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artists (
  artist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  award_name VARCHAR(255),
  nomination_year INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE awards (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    musician_id UUID NOT NULL,
    award_category TEXT NOT NULL,
    award_year INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(id)
);

CREATE TABLE nominations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    musician_id UUID NOT NULL,
    nomination_category TEXT NOT NULL,
    nomination_year INT NOT NULL,
    is_winner BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (musician_id) REFERENCES musicians(id)
);

CREATE TABLE nomination ( 
    nomination_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    award_id INT, 
    artist_id INT, 
    nomination_year INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (award_id) REFERENCES award(award_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artist(artist_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE committee_member ( 
    committee_id INT, 
    artist_id INT, 
    PRIMARY KEY (committee_id, artist_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (committee_id) REFERENCES committee(committee_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artist(artist_id) 
);
